original_text: My son, I warn you to be careful about any other teaching. There will always be more and more books to read. If you try to study everything, you will be very weak and tired. My son, I warn you to be careful about any other teaching. There will always be more and more books to read. If you try to study everything, you will be very weak and tired.
korean_text: 내 아들아 또 이것들로부터 경계를 받으라 많은 책들을 짓는 것은 끝이 없고 많이 공부하는 것은 몸을 피곤하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: to be careful about any other teaching
There will always be more and more books
sentences.korean_translation: 읽을 책은 항상 점점 더 많아질 것이다

sentences.original_text: If you try to study everything
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 모든 것을 공부하려고 시도한다면

sentences.original_text: you will be very weak and tired
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매우 약해지고 지치게 될 것이다
